content.html: A quick reminder as folks are glorifying absurd hours again: 1. Sustained crunch mode leads to net negative productivity vs. 40 hr/wk 2. Working sleep deprived leaves you as mentally impaired as being drunk Working longer *feels* productive but it makes you worse at your job.
content.value:
A quick reminder as folks are glorifying absurd hours again:

1. Sustained crunch mode leads to net negative productivity vs. 40 hr/wk

2. Working sleep deprived leaves you as mentally impaired as being drunk

Working longer *feels* productive but it makes you worse at your job.
